DocumentPictureInPictureEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The DocumentPictureInPictureEvent interface of the {{domxref("Document Picture-in-Picture API", "Document Picture-in-Picture API", "", "nocode")}} is the event object for the event, which fires when the Picture-in-Picture window is opened.

remarks.para:
-{{domxref("Document Picture-in-Picture API", "Document Picture-in-Picture API", "", "nocode")}}
-Using the Document Picture-in-Picture API

DocumentPictureInPictureEventWindow.summary:
NOTE Experimental The window read-only property of the
interface returns a instance representing the browsing context inside the DocumentPictureInPicture window the event was fired on.

remarks.para:
-{{domxref("Document Picture-in-Picture API", "Document Picture-in-Picture API", "", "nocode")}}
-Using the Document Picture-in-Picture API

DocumentPictureInPictureEventDocumentPic.summary:
NOTE Experimental The DocumentPictureInPictureEvent() constructor creates a new
object instance.

remarks.para:
-{{domxref("Document Picture-in-Picture API", "Document Picture-in-Picture API", "", "nocode")}}
-Using the Document Picture-in-Picture API
